data.lyric:
[ti:Best Shot]
[ar:Jimmie Allen]
[al:Jimmie Allen]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Best Shot - Jimmie Allen
[00:11.78]I'm just flesh and bone heart and soul
[00:15.24]And I've earned a couple scars
[00:17.84]I've let once in a lifetime
[00:20.42]Kind of things slide right out of my arms
[00:23.98]I've struck out
[00:25.42]I've been knocked down more times
[00:28.25]Than I can count
[00:29.95]Count
[00:30.71]But that don't matter now
[00:33.21]'Cause when you smile
[00:34.75]I see the sun sink down
[00:36.85]On a coast out in California
[00:39.24]And there's no doubt
[00:40.58]Because of you I'm not the man
[00:43.62]I was before you
[00:45.46]I'm not saying that I'm perfect
[00:48.67]Oh 'cause girl you know I'm not
[00:51.66]But I'll love you with everything I've got
[00:56.70]Girl I'll give you my best shot
[01:04.80]You saw a spark inside of me
[01:07.56]That no one else could find
[01:10.05]Your good morning eyes they get me high
[01:13.76]Girl you're always on my mind
[01:16.47]'Cause when you smile
[01:17.88]I see the sun sink down
[01:19.87]On a coast out in California
[01:22.27]And there's no doubt
[01:23.50]Because of you I'm not the man
[01:26.66]I was before you
[01:28.63]I'm not saying that I'm perfect
[01:31.68]Oh 'cause girl you know I'm not
[01:34.80]But I'll love you with everything I've got
[01:39.70]Girl I'll give you my best shot
[01:53.44]When I saw you for the first time
[01:56.39]I knew I'd found amazing grace
[01:59.30]It's like angels singing
[02:01.58]Every time I hear your name
[02:05.54]When you smile
[02:07.03]I see the sun sink down
[02:09.12]On a coast out in California
[02:11.50]And there's no doubt
[02:12.91]Because of you
[02:14.36]I'm not the man I was before you
[02:18.16]When you smile
[02:19.41]I see the sun sink down
[02:21.32]On a coast out in California
[02:23.77]And there's no doubt
[02:25.20]Because of you I'm better
[02:27.83]Than I was before you
[02:30.09]I'm not saying that I'm perfect
[02:33.20]Oh God knows I'm not
[02:36.33]But I'll love you with everything I've got
[02:41.20]Girl I'll give you my best shot
[02:45.34]I'm gonna give you
[02:47.81]I'll give you my best shot
[02:49.80]I'm gonna give
[02:51.37]I'm gonna give you yeah
[02:56.30]Whoa whoa yeah
[03:03.66]Whoa yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Best Shot]
[ar:Jimmie Allen]
[al:Jimmie Allen]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:11.78]我只是有血有肉有感情有灵魂
[00:15.24]我已经伤痕累累
[00:17.84]我这一生只有一次机会
[00:20.42]有些东西从我的怀里溜走
[00:23.98]我三振出局
[00:25.42]我被击倒的次数更多
[00:28.25]数不清
[00:29.95]数数
[00:30.71]但现在无所谓了
[00:33.21]因为当你微笑时
[00:34.75]我看见太阳落山
[00:36.85]在加州的海边
[00:39.24]毫无疑问
[00:40.58]因为你我不是那个男人
[00:43.62]我在你之前
[00:45.46]我不是说我完美无瑕
[00:48.67]因为姑娘你知道我不是
[00:51.66]但我会全心全意地爱你
[00:56.70]女孩我会给你我最好的机会
[01:04.80]你看见我内心的火花
[01:07.56]别人都找不到
[01:10.05]你含情脉脉的眼神让我兴奋不已
[01:13.76]姑娘你一直在我心里
[01:16.47]因为当你微笑时
[01:17.88]我看见太阳落山
[01:19.87]在加州的海边
[01:22.27]毫无疑问
[01:23.50]因为你我不是那个男人
[01:26.66]我在你之前
[01:28.63]我不是说我完美无瑕
[01:31.68]因为姑娘你知道我不是
[01:34.80]但我会全心全意地爱你
[01:39.70]女孩我会给你我最好的机会
[01:53.44]当我第一次见到你
[01:56.39]我知道我得到了天赐的恩典
[01:59.30]就像天使在歌唱
[02:01.58]每当我听到你的名字
[02:05.54]当你微笑时
[02:07.03]我看见太阳落山
[02:09.12]在加州的海边
[02:11.50]毫无疑问
[02:12.91]因为你
[02:14.36]我已不是你之前的那个我
[02:18.16]当你微笑时
[02:19.41]我看见太阳落山
[02:21.32]在加州的海边
[02:23.77]毫无疑问
[02:25.20]因为你我变得更好
[02:27.83]比遇见你之前的我更快乐
[02:30.09]我不是说我完美无瑕
[02:33.20]上帝知道我不是
[02:36.33]但我会全心全意地爱你
[02:41.20]女孩我会给你我最好的机会
[02:45.34]我会给你
[02:47.81]我会给你我最好的机会
[02:49.80]我会付出
[02:51.37]我会给你
